MemoryInfobox.description: 'General Lysander wanted the Athens|Athenian Fort Polemarchs dead and their military seals as proof, for it was on those blood-stained marks that he would rise to power.'

General_Description: '''Ambition''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s [[Genetic memory|genetic memories]], relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the [[Animus|Portable Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: [[Lysander]], a [[Sparta]]n [[Spartan army|general]], had a plan how to win the [[Peloponnesian War|war]]. To do this, he tasked Kassandra to weaken the [[Athens|Athenians]] by killing the ''[[polemarch]]oi'' of three [[fort]]s.
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra noticed a Spartan commander at the foot of [[Leonidas I of Sparta|Leonidas]]' statue atop his [[Tomb of Leonidas|tomb]], lecturing his [[soldier]]s.
*'''Lysander:''' ''We'll not be outmaneuvered by the Athenians the way the [[Iran|Persians]] [[Battle of Thermopylae|did]] to Leonidas.''

Kassandra approached him.
*'''Lysander:''' ''You're not one of my soldiers. You better have a good reason for being here.''
<tabber>
|-|I don't need a reason.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I don't need a reason, good or otherwise.''
Lysander laughed.
*'''Lysander:''' ''Ah. Some bite to you, is there?''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''More than some cowering [[dog]].''
Lysander guffawed.
|-|We Spartans stick together.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''We Spartans stand together. So here I am.''
Lysander loosened up.
*'''Lysander:''' ''Yes. Spartan blood matters most.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Looks like this victory will bring you glory.''
Lysander stood proudly.
*'''Lysander:''' ''The rewards of skill and effort!''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''It's the Spartan way.''
</tabber>
Lysander paused briefly then spoke.
*'''Lysander:''' ''From [[helot|slave]] to general, bathing in the blood of this war, while our leaders stuff their faces and preen.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''The polemarchs believe it's an easy victory.''
*'''Lysander:''' ''I will end this war in my favor.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''You have a strategy?''
*'''Lysander:''' ''Athenian polemarchs are paralyzed with indecision. They serve too many masters.''
*'''Kassandra: ''' ''Making them slow to react.''
*'''Lysander: ''' ''And that's where you come in. Infiltrate their forts and kill their polemarchs. I need the way clear for my troops.''
(Accept – I'll kill the polemarchs)
*'''Kassandra: ''' ''I'll do my part. Consider the commanders already dead.''
*'''Lysander: ''' ''Bring me their Athenian seals as proof. You'll be rewarded for your efforts.''
In time, Kassandra eventually completed the task and returned to Lysander.
*'''Lysander: ''' ''The blood of the enemy will show our leaders that my strategy is the right one.''
*'''Kassandra: ''' ''These seals should help convince them.''
*'''Lysander: ''' ''You've done well. Our troops are on the move.''
*'''Kassandra: ''' ''They underestimate Spartans.''
*'''Lysander: ''' ''They consider me much lower than a Spartan.''

(Dialogue continues in the next quest.)
Section_Outcome: Kassandra helped Lysander collect 3 ''polemarch'' seals. In return, she obtained Lysander's own personal [[Lysander's Belt|belt]] and another task to retrieve 3 more seals.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
